title: The Little Mermaid Wants to HYPNOTIZE You! 😵‍💫 #shorts
description:
We’ve been singing “Under the Sea” for years! But did we ever stop to ask whether Ariel is an ACTUAL mermaid under the sea? Sure, she looks like one; but, she acts more like another creature. She sings, lures in Prince Eric, and hangs out on the rocky shores JUST like this mythological creature…

👀 The DARK Secret of the Little Mermaid ►► https://youtu.be/V0QXdYrxRZQ
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

Editor: Shnaia "Naya" Llamera
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman
